Jardim

Inspired by Tom Critchlow's Wiki, this is my digital garden, affectionally known as meu jardim, or "my garden" in English. I collect blog posts (both my own and stuff I've found online), ideas, rough drafts, and things like that.

For individual notes, you can also read my mini notes or recortes ("cuttings" in English—to go with the garden theme).
